properties.entry: SELECT PLAYER_NO, PLAYER_NM, PLAYER_SALARY, PLAYER_TEAM, PLAYER_ENROLL, PLAYER_PASSWORD, PLAYER_DIV FROM PLAYER WHERE PLAYER_NO = ? AND PLAYER_PASSWORD = ? AND PLAYER_TEAM = 'NY'
INSERT INTO PLAYER(PLAYER_NO, PLAYER_NM, PLAYER_SALARY, PLAYER_PASSWORD, PLAYER_DIV) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
UPDATE HITTER SET PLAYER_AB = PLAYER_AB + ?, PLAYER_HIT = PLAYER_HIT + ?, PLAYER_HOME = PLAYER_HOME + ? WHERE PLAYER_NO = ?
SELECT PLAYER_NO, PLAYER_AB, PLAYER_HIT, PLAYER_HOME, ROUND(PLAYER_HIT / PLAYER_AB , 3) FROM HITTER WHERE PLAYER_NO = ?
UPDATE PITCHER SET PLAYE_VIC = PLAYE_VIC + ?, PLA_LOSE = PLA_LOSE + ?, PLY_INN = PLY_INN + ?, PLA_ER = PLA_ER + ? WHERE PLAYER_NO = ?
SELECT PLAYER_NO, PLAYE_VIC, PLA_LOSE, PLY_INN, PLA_ER, ROUND( PLA_ER * 9 / PLY_INN, 2) FROM PITCHER WHERE PLAYER_NO = ?
UPDATE PLAYER SET PLAYER_SALARY = ? WHERE PLAYER_NO = ?
UPDATE PLAYER SET PLAYER_TEAM = ? WHERE PLAYER_NO = ?
SELECT PLAYER_NO, PLAYER_NM, PLAYE_VIC, PLA_LOSE, PLY_INN, ROUND((PLA_ER * 9 / PLY_INN), 2) FROM PLAYER JOIN PITCHER USING(PLAYER_NO) WHERE PLAYER_TEAM = 'NY'
SELECT PLAYER_NO, PLAYER_NM, PLAYER_AB, PLAYER_HIT, PLAYER_HOME, ROUND((PLAYER_HIT / PLAYER_AB), 3) FROM PLAYER JOIN HITTER USING(PLAYER_NO) WHERE PLAYER_TEAM = 'NY'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PLAYER WHERE PLAYER_TEAM = 'NY' AND PLAYER_NO = ?
SELECT PLAYER_NO, PLAYER_NM, PLAYER_SALARY, PLAYER_ENROLL, PLAYER_DIV, SUBSTR(PLAYER_PASSWORD, 1, 2)||'**' FROM PLAYER WHERE PLAYER_TEAM = 'NY'
